text: Yakshcho zhinka boyitʹsya nepryyazni cholovika chy vin unykaye yiyi, to ne bude yim obom hrikha, yakshcho vony polahodyatʹ mizh soboyu myrom, adzhe zlahoda – krashcha! Lyudy ye zhadibnymy, ale, yakshcho vy budete dobrochynnymy ta bohoboyazlyvymy, to, voistynu, Allahu vidomo te, shcho robyte vy
